articles.content: PHILADELPHIA (CBS) -- Country artist Jelly Roll is being sued by a Pennsylvania wedding band — alleging they've been going by the name Jellyroll for years before the CMT Award winner's career took of… [+3921 chars]

articles.description: More than 2 dozen performers are added to Library of Congress' National Recording Registry

articles.title: Vince McMahon “Is Not Coming Back To The Company”, TKO And Endeavor Exec Mark Shapiro Affirms After Former WWE Boss Sells Another $412M In Stock - Deadline
articles.description: Vince McMahon, the ex-WWE chief  facing a graphic sexual abuse lawsuit "is not coming back to the company," TKO President Mark Shapiro said Wednesday.
